content.text: is designed to handle billing adjustments for accounts associated with the New York Power Authority (NYPA). It processes account billing records, particularly focusing on adjustments and rebills for revised billing periods. The procedure updates various billing tables, calculates adjustments, and ensures that the billing records reflect the correct amounts and usage data. It also manages the state of processing for the current billing period and logs any errors encountered during execution.
The complexity of this stored procedure is high due to several factors:
It involves multiple updates across different tables, each with specific conditions and calculations.
The procedure includes error handling with a TRY-CATCH block, which adds to the complexity.
It manages transactional integrity and state changes across multiple billing periods and accounts.
The procedure involves intricate business logic related to billing adjustments and requires careful handling of various billing attributes.
: This parameter represents the ID of the user executing the procedure. It is used to log changes and updates made by the user.
: This is an output parameter used to indicate the success or failure of the procedure's execution. A value of 0 shows success, while other values indicate failure.
: The procedure initializes several local variables used throughout the execution, including flags and counters for tracking updates and errors.
table with revised billing amounts and usage data based on adjustments from
table with detailed billing information, including various charges and adjustments.
: The procedure calculates total paid adjustments and inserts them into
table with the calculated total paid adjustments and ensures that the adjustments are marked as processed in
: The procedure uses a TRY-CATCH block to handle errors. If an error occurs, it logs the error details and rolls back the transaction.
to indicate that processing for the current period is complete.
: The procedure performs multiple updates on large tables, which can be resource-intensive and impact performance, especially if the tables are large or heavily indexed.
: The use of transactions ensures data integrity but can also lead to locking and blocking issues if the procedure runs for an extended period.
: Ensuring that the tables involved have appropriate indexes can help improve the performance of the joins and updates.
: The procedure may face concurrency issues if multiple instances are executed simultaneously, leading to potential deadlocks or data inconsistencies.
: While the procedure includes error handling, the error message construction and logging could be improved for better clarity and debugging.
: The procedure assumes that certain conditions (e.g., unique account records) are met, which may not always be the case, leading to potential data integrity issues.
: As the volume of billing records grows, the procedure may face scalability challenges, requiring optimization or refactoring to handle larger datasets efficiently.

--**************************************************************************************
--* Name:         
--* Description:  Process the NYPA account billing adjustments bills using a set operation.
--*                         
--*     The first action is to find the current account billing record.  There should only be one record but if there
--*     are more than one determine which account the revision should be applied to.  This might occur when an
--*     account has been switched from one agency to another and the account and meter numbers have not changed.
--*     
--*     The second action is determine whether the original billing period for the revised period exists.  Check that only
--*     one account exists.  If it does not exist exec the  [dbo].[usp_ProcessAccountBillingRebillAddMissingBills] stored
--*		procedure using the following parameters:
--*		@UtilityCompanySeqid,   @CreateOriginalBillForRevisionPeriod,@AccountBillingAjustmentSeqid,@StatusCode OUTPUT 
--*
--*		Finally, calculate the paid adjustment on a per transaction baisis.
--*               
--* Exec: usp_ProcessAccountBillingEachCanceRebill
--*
--* Parameter(s):         
--*		@UtilityCompanySeqid int,  
--*		@AccountBillingAjustmentSeqid int,  
--*		StatusCode  int output       -  Execution Return Status 
--*
--* Return:	    0 Success
--*                 1 Failure
--*
--* AUTHOR:       Peter Heller (PAH)
--* Created On:   10/26/2005
--**************************************************************************************
--* Date         Tech Description of Change
--* ---------- ----  -------------------------------------------------------------
--* 08/23/2018  zd  Added NetMetering columns to the AccountBillingElectric Update
--* 03/16/2015 PAH  Added Standby columns to the AccountBillingElectric Update
--* 05/09/2011 PAH  Added NetReactivepower dollars to NetPaidAdjustment
--* 11/07/2006 PAH  First Version  f
--* 12/12/2006 PAH  First Version  
--***************************************************************************************
CREATE PROCEDURE [Nypa].[usp_ProcessAccountBillingRebills]
(
	@AuthenticatedUserID AS INT
	,@StatusCode AS INT OUTPUT
)
AS
BEGIN 
	DECLARE @RC INT
	DECLARE @InvoiceTrackingSeqid INT
	DECLARE @InvoiceUtilityCompanyCoverSheetSeqid INT
	DECLARE @NYPAAccountBillingGroup INT
	DECLARE @BillingCycle VARCHAR(1)
	DECLARE @BillingPeriod VARCHAR(6)
	DECLARE @ExhangeCodeNull VARCHAR(2)
	DECLARE @FromDateParm VARCHAR(1) 
	DECLARE @ToDateParm VARCHAR(1) 
	DECLARE @Yes VARCHAR(1) 
	DECLARE @CreateOriginalBillForRevisionPeriod VARCHAR(1) 
	DECLARE @VoucherAmount MONEY
	DECLARE @CoverSheetRecordTypeForTotalAmount VARCHAR(4)
	DECLARE @InvoicedBill VARCHAR(1)
	DECLARE @BillingSequenceNumber INT
	DECLARE @CoverSheetPdfFilename ldesc
	DECLARE @VoucherCreated VARCHAR(2)
	DECLARE @OriginalBillDeliveryMinimumFromDate VARCHAR(8)
	DECLARE @OriginalBillDeliveryMaximumToDate VARCHAR(8)
	DECLARE @PostMarkDate VARCHAR(8)
	DECLARE @DatePaymentDue VARCHAR(8)
	DECLARE @DateAcceptanceIntoOEC VARCHAR(8)
    DECLARE @errCurrentAccountNumber NVARCHAR(15)
    DECLARE @errOriginalAccountNumber NVARCHAR(15)
    DECLARE @errCurrentMeterNumber NVARCHAR(12)
    DECLARE @errOriginalMeterNumber NVARCHAR(12)
    DECLARE @ExchangeErrorMessage NVARCHAR(4000);
    DECLARE @ErrorMessage NVARCHAR(4000);
    DECLARE @ErrorSeverity INT;
    DECLARE @ErrorState INT;
    DECLARE @ErrorNumber INT;
    DECLARE @ErrorLine INT;
    DECLARE @ErrorProcedure NVARCHAR(126);
    DECLARE @CommitTransaction VARCHAR(1)  
    DECLARE @FindOriginalAccountBillingRecord INT
    DECLARE @FindRevisedAccountBillingRecord INT
    DECLARE @MissingOriginalAccountBillingRecord INT
    DECLARE @FindAccountBillingRecordForRevision INT
    DECLARE @MissingAccountBillingRecordForRevision INT
    DECLARE @AddMissingAccountBillingRecordForRevision INT
    DECLARE @AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric INT
    DECLARE @AccountBillingElectric INT
    DECLARE @AccountBilling INT
    DECLARE @UtilityCompanySeqid INT
    DECLARE @NetPaidAdjustmentUpdates INT

    SET @MissingOriginalAccountBillingRecord = 0
    SET @MissingOriginalAccountBillingRecord = 0
    SET @FindOriginalAccountBillingRecord = 0
    SET @CreateOriginalBillForRevisionPeriod = 'O'
    SET @UtilityCompanySeqid = 7

    BEGIN
        BEGIN TRY
		-- begin transaction ProcessCancelRebills;
        SET @CommitTransaction = 'Y'
	
		--	Process all Account Billing Records For Revision CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount
		--
		-- 	Revised Period rebilled amounts and usages
		--    (AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.RevisedBillingPeriod = AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
		--     AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.RevisedBillingPeriod = AccountBilling.BillingPeriod)
		--
        UPDATE Billing.AccountBilling
        SET LastPeriodModified = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod
            ,FromDate = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.FromDate
            ,ToDate = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ToDate
            ,RevisedBilledAmount = ISNULL(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalReBilledAmount, 0)
                    + ISNULL(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount, 0)
                    + ISNULL(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.RevisedReactivePowerDollars, 0)
                    + ISNULL(Billing.AccountBillingElectric.CommodityAllocationCharge, 0)
                    + ISNULL(Billing.AccountBillingElectric.DeliveryAllocationCharge, 0)
            ,AccountEnergyUsage = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountEnergyUsage
            ,AccountDemandUsage = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountDemandUsage
            ,NetEnergyUsageChange = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountEnergyUsage
                    + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelAccountEnergyUsage
            ,NetDemandUsageChange = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountDemandUsage
                    + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelAccountDemandUsage
            ,NetDollarChange = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalNetAdjustedAmount
            ,ProductionAndDeliveryTariff = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ProductionAndDeliveryTariff
            ,LastUpdate = GETDATE()
            ,AuthenticatedUserID = @AuthenticatedUserID
            ,Billing.AccountBilling.FireAuditTrigger = 'Y'
            ,AccountReactivePowerEnergy = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountReactivePowerEnergy
            ,NetChangeAccountReactivePowerEnergy = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.NetChangeAccountReactivePowerEnergy
        FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric
            INNER JOIN Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
            INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBilling ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AdjustedAccountBill = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid
            INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingElectric ON Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.MonthlyAccountBillingChargesElectric
        WHERE (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod = 'N' )
            AND ( Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y' )

        SET @AccountBilling = @@rowcount

        PRINT 'Number of Account billing Updates: ' + CAST(@AccountBilling AS VARCHAR(10))

		--	Process all Account Billing Electric Records For Revision
		-- 	Revised Period rebilled detail and reset the AdjustedAccountElectric to 
		--	the new adjustment record and the previous state of the row will be written to the 
		--	AuditAccountBillingElectric table
        UPDATE  Billing.AccountBillingElectric
        SET LastPeriodModified = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod
			,BilledAmount = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalReBilledAmount
			,AdjustedAccountElectric = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectricSeqid
            ,BillCreationDate = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.BillCreationDate
            ,PostMarkDate = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.PostMarkDate
            ,DatePaymentDue = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.DatePaymentDue
            ,DateAcceptanceIntoOEC = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.DateAcceptanceIntoOEC
            ,PreviousAccountBalance = ISNULL(Billing.AccountBillingElectric.PreviousAccountBalance, 0.00)
            ,FuelAdjustmentAmount = ISNULL(Billing.AccountBillingElectric.FuelAdjustmentAmount, 0.00)
            ,LatePaymentAmount = ISNULL(Billing.AccountBillingElectric.LatePaymentAmount, 0.00)
            ,ArrearAmount = ISNULL(Billing.AccountBillingElectric.ArrearAmount, 0.00)
            ,CreditedPaidAmount = ISNULL(Billing.AccountBillingElectric.CreditedPaidAmount, 0.00)
            ,CreditedPaymentDate = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.CreditedPaymentDate
            ,DiscountPercentage = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.DiscountPercentage
            ,DDDSurchargeAmount = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DDDSurchargeAmount
            ,DDDSurchargePercentage = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DDDSurchargePercentage
            ,DeliveryConsumption = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryConsumption
            ,DeliveryConsumptionOffPeak = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryConsumptionOffPeak
            ,DeliveryConsumptionShoulder = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryConsumptionShoulder
            ,DeliveryDemand = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryDemand
            ,DeliveryDemandOffPeak = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryDemandOffPeak
            ,DeliveryDemandShoulder = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryDemandShoulder
            ,DeliveryStreetLightingFacilityPoints = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryStreetLightingFacilityPoints
            ,CommodityConsumption = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityConsumption
            ,CommodityConsumptionOffPeak = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityConsumptionOffPeak
            ,CommodityConsumptionShoulder = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityConsumptionShoulder
            ,CommodityDemand = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityDemand
            ,CommodityDemandOffPeak = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityDemandOffPeak
            ,CommodityDemandShoulder = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityDemandShoulder
            ,CommodityFacilityPoints = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityFacilityPoints
            ,GrossReceiptTax = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.GrossReceiptTax
            ,GRTRate = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.GRTRate
            ,LoadFactor = [dbo].[CalculateLoadFactor](Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountEnergyUsage,
                                                              Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountDemandUsage,
                                                              Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.FromDate,
                                                              Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ToDate)
            ,EnergyCostAdjustment = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.EnergyCostAdjustment
            ,EnergyCostAdjustmentPercentage = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.EnergyCostAdjustmentPercentage
            ,InitialPostingDate = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.InitialPostingDate
            ,AccountDemandUsage = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountDemandUsage
            ,AccountEnergyUsage = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountEnergyUsage
            ,AuthenticatedUserID = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AuthenticatedUserID
            ,LastUpdate = GETDATE()
            ,CustomerMinimumCharge = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CustomerMinimumCharge
            ,IsMinimumBilledCharged = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.IsMinimumBilledCharged
            ,MinimumBilledEnergyDollars = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MinimumBilledEnergyDollars
            ,MinimumBilledDemandDollars = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MinimumBilledDemandDollars
            ,MaxBilledDemandPeriod = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MaxBilledDemandPeriod
            ,MaxBilledDemandUsage = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MaxBilledDemandUsage
            ,IsSpannedPeriodBill = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.IsSpannedPeriodBill
            ,DeliveryFacilityPointsAmount = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryFacilityPointsAmount
            ,FireAuditTrigger = 'Y'
            ,RevisedReactivePowerDollars = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.RevisedReactivePowerDollars
            ,NetchangeReactivePowerDollars = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.NetchangeReactivePowerDollars
            ,MinimumBilledDemandUsage = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MinimumBilledDemandUsage
            ,IsDeliveryMinimumBilledFlag = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.IsDeliveryMinimumBilledFlag
            ,DeliveryMinimumBilledAmount = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMinimumBilledAmount
            ,DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
            ,ProductionMisc1 = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ProductionMisc1
            ,ProductionMisc2 = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ProductionMisc2
            ,DeliveryMisc1 = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMisc1
            ,DeliveryMisc2 = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMisc2
            ,MinimumBilledEnergyUsage = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MinimumBilledEnergyUsage
            ,DeliveryMaximumBilledDemand = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMaximumBilledDemand
            ,DeliveryMaximumBilledDemandPeriod = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMaximumBilledDemandPeriod
            ,StandbyContractDemand = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.StandbyContractDemand
            ,StandbyContractDemandCharges = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.StandbyContractDemandCharges
            ,StandbyAsUsedDailyDemand = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.StandbyAsUsedDailyDemand
            ,StandbyAsUsedDailyDemandCharges = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.StandbyAsUsedDailyDemandCharges
			,CreditCurrentPeriod			   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CreditCurrentPeriod
			,CancelCreditCurrentPeriod		   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCreditCurrentPeriod
			,CreditPrecedingPeriod			   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CreditPrecedingPeriod
			,CancelCreditPrecedingPeriod	   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCreditPrecedingPeriod
			,CreditToApplySatellites		   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CreditToApplySatellites
			,CancelCreditToApplySatellites	   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCreditToApplySatellites
			,CreditFromHost					   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CreditFromHost
			,CancelCreditFromHost			   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCreditFromHost
			,CreditsToCarryForward			   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CreditsToCarryForward
			,CancelCreditsToCarryForward	   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCreditsToCarryForward
			,CurrentPeriodOffPeakCredit		   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CurrentPeriodOffPeakCredit
			,CancelCurrentPeriodOffPeakCredit  = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCurrentPeriodOffPeakCredit
			,CurrentPeriodOnPeakCredit		   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CurrentPeriodOnPeakCredit
			,CancelCurrentPeriodOnPeakCredit   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCurrentPeriodOnPeakCredit
			,NetMeteredAccountFlag			   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.NetMeteredAccountFlag
			,CancelNetMeteredAccountFlag	   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelNetMeteredAccountFlag
			,HostNetMeteredAccountNumber	   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.HostNetMeteredAccountNumber
			,CancelHostNetMeteredAccountNumber = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelHostNetMeteredAccountNumber
			,PEXCESS						   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.PEXCESS
			,CancelPEXCESS					   = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelPEXCESS
        FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric
			INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBilling ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AdjustedAccountBill = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid
			INNER JOIN Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
			INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingElectric ON Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.MonthlyAccountBillingChargesElectric
                AND Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AdjustedAccountBillElectric = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.AccountBillingElectricSeqid
        WHERE Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod = 'N'
            AND Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y'
		
        SET @AccountBillingElectric = @@rowcount
        PRINT 'Number of Account billing Electric Updates: ' + STR(@AccountBillingElectric)
	
		--  The TotalAmountDue is the original billed amount and adjustments for the current billing period.  It is
		--  a static number that does not change in future periods even if there are retro-active adjustments.
	
        TRUNCATE TABLE Nypa.UploadNYPASummaryPaidBillAdj
	
		-- Added NetchangeReactivePowerDollars to the TotalPaidAdjustment
        INSERT  INTO Nypa.UploadNYPASummaryPaidBillAdj
            (UniqueAccountSeqId
			,BillingPeriod
            ,OriginalAccountNumber
            ,TotalPaidAdjustment)
        SELECT UniqueAccountSeqId
			,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod
            ,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.OriginalAccountNumber
            ,SUM(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalNetAdjustedAmount
                        + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.NetchangeReactivePowerDollars) AS TotalPaidAdjustment
        FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric
                        INNER JOIN Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
                                                              AND Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision <> Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
        WHERE Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y'
        GROUP BY Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod
            ,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.OriginalAccountNumber
			,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.UniqueAccountSeqID /* added on 2/6/2019 */
	
        UPDATE  Nypa.UploadNYPASummaryPaidBillAdj
        SET     CurrentAccountNumber = Billing.Account.CurrentAccountNumber
        FROM Nypa.UploadNYPASummaryPaidBillAdj
            INNER JOIN Billing.Account ON Nypa.UploadNYPASummaryPaidBillAdj.OriginalAccountNumber = Billing.Account.OriginalAccountNumber
        WHERE Billing.Account.UtilityAccountProvider = 7
            AND Billing.Account.CurrentInvoiceAccountGroup = 1
	
		-- Update each account billing record with the billing period aggregate paid adjustment
		-- Equate the  ManualPaymentOverrideAmount = TotalAmountDue PAH 12/8/2011
        UPDATE  Billing.AccountBilling
        SET PaidAdjustmentAmount = Nypa.uvw_UploadNYPACurrentAccountNumberSummaryNetPaidBillAdjustment.TotalPaidAdjustment
            ,TotalAmountDue = ISNULL(Billing.AccountBilling.OriginalBilledAmount, 0)
                        + ISNULL(Nypa.uvw_UploadNYPACurrentAccountNumberSummaryNetPaidBillAdjustment.TotalPaidAdjustment, 0)
            ,ManualPaymentOverrideAmount = ISNULL(Billing.AccountBilling.OriginalBilledAmount, 0)
                        + ISNULL(Nypa.uvw_UploadNYPACurrentAccountNumberSummaryNetPaidBillAdjustment.TotalPaidAdjustment, 0)
            ,AuthenticatedUserID = @AuthenticatedUserID
            ,LastUpdate = GETDATE()
        FROM Nypa.uvw_UploadNYPACurrentAccountNumberSummaryNetPaidBillAdjustment
            INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBilling
			ON Nypa.uvw_UploadNYPACurrentAccountNumberSummaryNetPaidBillAdjustment.UniqueAccountSeqID = Billing.AccountBilling.UniqueAccountSeqId
			AND Nypa.uvw_UploadNYPACurrentAccountNumberSummaryNetPaidBillAdjustment.BillingPeriod = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod
            INNER JOIN Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame ON Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
                                                              AND Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
        WHERE (Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')
            AND ( Billing.AccountBilling.UtilityCompanySeqid = 7 )
            AND ( Billing.AccountBilling.CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup = 1 )
	
        SET @NetPaidAdjustmentUpdates = @@rowcount
        PRINT 'Number of Net Paid Adjustment Updates: ' + STR(@NetPaidAdjustmentUpdates)
	
		--	Found the sequnce id's for the following tables: Account,Account Billing and Account Billing Electric.
		-- 	The sequence id's are updated in the adjustment record to preserve the state of these specific changes.
        UPDATE Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric
        SET ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod = 'Y'
			,AdjustedAccount = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountSeqid
			,AdjustedAccountBill = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid
			,AdjustedAccountBillElectric = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.AccountBillingElectricSeqid
			,AuthenticatedUserID = @AuthenticatedUserID
			,LastUpdate = GETDATE()
        FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric
            INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBilling ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision
                AND Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod
                AND Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.UniqueAccountSeqId = Billing.AccountBilling.UniqueAccountSeqId
				AND Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod
                AND Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision
            INNER JOIN Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
                AND Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision <> Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
            INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingElectric ON Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.MonthlyAccountBillingChargesElectric
        WHERE (Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')
            AND (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod = 'N')
            AND (Billing.AccountBilling.UtilityCompanySeqid = 7)
            AND (Billing.AccountBilling.CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup = 1)

        SET @AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric = @@rowcount
        PRINT 'Number of Account Billing Adjustment Electric Updates: ' + STR(@AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric)
	
		-- Marked as processing has completed for the billing period
        UPDATE Common.UploadCycleParameters
        SET CanProcessData = 'N'
            ,IsCurrentPeriodProcessingComplete = 'Y'
            ,CurrentProcessingPeriodCompleted = dbo.ConvertDateToStringDate(GETDATE())
            ,AuthenticatedUserID = @AuthenticatedUserID
            ,LastUpdate = GETDATE()
        FROM Common.UploadCycleParameters
            INNER JOIN Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame ON Common.UploadCycleParameters.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
        WHERE (Common.UploadCycleParameters.UtilityCompanySeqid = 7)
            AND (Common.UploadCycleParameters.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid = 1)
            AND (Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')
    END TRY
    BEGIN CATCH
        SELECT  @ExchangeErrorMessage = 'Error in StoredProcedure %125s at line number %8.0d'
            ,@ErrorMessage = ERROR_MESSAGE()
            ,@ErrorSeverity = ERROR_SEVERITY()
            ,@ErrorState = ERROR_STATE()
            ,@ErrorNumber = ERROR_NUMBER()
            ,@ErrorProcedure = ERROR_PROCEDURE()
            ,@ErrorLine = ERROR_LINE();			
		
        SET @ErrorMessage = @ExchangeErrorMessage + @ErrorMessage
		
        RAISERROR (@ErrorMessage, -- Message text.
				   @ErrorSeverity, -- Severity.
				   @ErrorState, -- State.
				   @ErrorProcedure,
				   @ErrorLine
				   ) WITH LOG;

        SET @CommitTransaction = 'N'

        ROLLBACK TRANSACTION ProcessCancelRebills;

    END CATCH;

    SET @StatusCode = 0
    END;
END;
